General.Name: Alpa Laboratories Limited
General.Description: Alpa Laboratories Limited engages in manufacturing and selling pharmaceutical finished dosage forms in India. It offers ethical, generic, and over the counter products in various finished dosage forms, including injections, tablets, capsules, eye and ear drops, ointments, creams, and gels for human use. The company also provides boluses, injections, and intra-mammary infusions for veterinary use. In addition, the company provides drugs in various categories, such as anti-infectives comprising antibacterial, antibiotics, antifungals, antiprotozoals, and antivirals; analgesics; anti-inflammatory drugs; cough and cold drugs; cardiovascular drugs; anti-diabetics; nutritional supplements; psychotropic drugs; and skin care preparations, as well as ear and eye care preparations. It sells its products through distributors, retail chemists, retail pharmacy stores, and hospitals. The company also exports its products to South and Central America, Africa, and Asia, and CIS countries. Alpa Laboratories Limited was founded in 1967 and is based in Indore, India.
